channel.title: Help with background color
channel.description: Can someone help me change the color of the grass? Everything is currently white with snow, i want it the normal way. Can someone tell me how to fix this? (its client sided, i think)

item.title: Help with background color
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Change your cache… Try downloading a clean version of your client’s cache like if your client is bluur based download bluurs original cache (IF YOUR USING BLUUR’S CLIENT DONT… HIS IS FUCKING WORST)

Read full topic
